subject: Citibank, 1107 Broadway Bra
body:
Citibank, 1107 Broadway Branch
Full Service Brick and Mortar Office
1107 Broadway
New York, NY 10010
SIR
Good morning and congratulations all the people that have been scammed by
the Nigeria government  the Citi Bank have set a panel to compensate them
and your name has been included as one of the beneficiary we are waiting
for your quick respond.
Robert Baker
Account Officer

subject: Re:    Citibank, 1107 Broadway Bra
body:
Hello Robert Baker,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate the information you have shared about Citibank's initiative to compensate those who have been scammed by the Nigeria government. It's good to know that steps are being taken to address such issues.

Could you please provide me with more details about this compensation program? How does it work and what is the process for claiming it? I want to make sure I have all the necessary information before proceeding.

Also, could you clarify how my name got included in this program? I don't recall reporting any scam or contacting Citibank regarding this matter. It would be helpful to understand how my name came up.

Thank you once again for bringing this to my attention. I look forward to hearing back from you with more information.

Best wishes,
Paul
